document_data.name: Yu Kai
document_data.mainbody: '''Yu Kai''' was a famous mercenary and "[[kraken hunter]]" operating in [[Westgate]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite organized play/LFR/A Stab in the Dark|8}}
document_data.Activities:
Yu Kai ran the boastful and colorfully named [[Yu Kai's Kraken Exterminators]], a mercenary agency that promised to protect merchant ships out of Westgate's harbor from dangerous monsters of the [[Abolethic Sovereignty]].

Yu Kai was rumored to take an interest in the movements of the city of [[Xxiphu]].
document_data.Relationships: Yu Kai worked and took meals with [[Sashara Keenspear]], a fellow famous kraken hunter. The pair were known to inspect ships in the harbor and to eat together in the private rooms of the ''[[Shell Queen]]''.
